# Surefooted Stride, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Bard Spells|Bard 5]], [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]], [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 8]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature/level, no two of which are more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 216

This spell functions like *[[Surefooted Stride (Spell)|surefooted stride]],* except as noted here.
